title: Project Engineer_ Vũng Tàu
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH MANPOWER VIỆT NAM
job_description:
Project Engineer to join our team in the energy sector.
In this role, you’ll be involved in the full lifecycle of engineering projects — from design and production to quality control and on-site construction supervision. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to help deliver impactful, high-quality solutions, while growing your skills in a supportive and dynamic environment.
Key Responsibilities:
Participate in design, technical documentation, and planning activities
Support production and ensure alignment with design specifications
Monitor and maintain quality standards across the entire project phase
Supervise technical execution at construction sites, including installation and commissioning
Coordinate with internal teams and contractors to resolve technical challenges
Ensure adherence to industry standards, safety procedures, and client requirements
Other tasks as assigned by the team leader or supervisor
requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Materials Science, Civil/Structural Engineering, or related field
Fresh Graduate – 4 years of experience in energy projects (including internships)
Knowledge of FEED, PECI, fabrication, construction, and PRE- Commissioning processes.
Familiar with industry codes and standards (e.g. IEC, ISO, ASME, API, etc.)
Good communication skills in English (TOEIC ≥ 650 or equivalent)
Strong problem-solving skills, teamwork, and accountability
Willingness to work on-site - Vũng Tàu
